cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.
cards.flavorText: Standard-issue. Reliable. Boring.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.
cards.flavorText: The armor holds. For now.

cards.name: Thermal Vent
cards.description: Gain 4 Block. Gain 1 Overheat.
cards.flavorText: Redirecting excess heat to defensive systems.

cards.name: Rage Spike
cards.description: Deal 4 damage. If you took damage this turn, deal 8 instead.
cards.flavorText: Pain is just fuel with a different name.

cards.name: System Check
cards.description: Draw 1 card. Exhaust.
cards.flavorText: Running diagnostics... errors found: 47.

cards.name: Thermal Spike
cards.description: Deal 8 damage. Gain 2 Overheat.
cards.flavorText: The reactor screams. So do they.

cards.name: Iron Will
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.
cards.flavorText: Built to endure what flesh cannot.

cards.name: Overcharge
cards.description: Deal 12 damage. Gain 3 Overheat.
cards.flavorText: Warning lights are just suggestions.

cards.name: Vent Heat
cards.description: Lose all Overheat. Gain Block equal to Overheat lost.
cards.flavorText: Controlled release. A rare moment of restraint.

cards.name: Reckless Charge
cards.description: Deal 7 damage. Take 3 damage.
cards.flavorText: Forward is the only direction that matters.

cards.name: Scrap Armor
cards.description: Gain 5 Block. Gain 1 Armor.
cards.flavorText: Welded from the fallen. They protect him still.

cards.name: Fuel the Fire
cards.description: Take 4 damage. Gain 2 Rage. Draw 1 card.
cards.flavorText: Every wound is a promise of violence.

cards.name: Smash
cards.description: Deal 10 damage. If the enemy intends to attack, deal 14 instead.
cards.flavorText: Let them come.

cards.name: Emergency Coolant
cards.description: Lose 3 Overheat.
cards.flavorText: Buying time. Not much, but enough.

cards.name: Heavy Strike
cards.description: Deal 14 damage.
cards.flavorText: No tricks. Just force.

cards.name: Searing Blow
cards.description: Deal 6 damage. Deal additional damage equal to your Overheat.
cards.flavorText: Heat transfer: efficient and brutal.

cards.name: Battle Cry
cards.description: Gain 1 Rage. Draw 2 cards.
cards.flavorText: The sound that comes out isn't quite human anymore.

cards.name: Brace
cards.description: Gain 7 Block. If you have Armor, gain 3 additional Block.
cards.flavorText: Feet planted. Systems locked. Ready.

cards.name: Spark
cards.description: Deal 3 damage. Gain 1 Overheat.
cards.flavorText: Small flame. Big potential.

cards.name: Wounded Fury
cards.description: Deal damage equal to your missing HP (max 20).
cards.flavorText: The closer to death, the more dangerous.

cards.name: Rage Protocol
cards.description: Whenever you take damage, gain 1 Rage.
cards.flavorText: Pain receptors rerouted. Now they fuel something else.

cards.name: Titan Stance
cards.description: Gain 12 Block. Next turn, counter for 6 damage when hit.
cards.flavorText: The old war machines fought this way. So does he.

cards.name: Reactor Breach
cards.description: Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies. Gain 2 Overheat.
cards.flavorText: Controlled explosion. Emphasis on 'controlled.'

cards.name: Armor Plating
cards.description: Gain 3 Block at the start of each turn.
cards.flavorText: Layer after layer. The Titans knew how to build.

cards.name: Blood Rage
cards.description: Deal 8 damage. Deal additional damage equal to your Rage.
cards.flavorText: The angrier he gets, the harder he hits.

cards.name: Runaway Reactor
cards.description: Gain 1 Overheat at the start of each turn. Overheat cards deal +2 damage.
cards.flavorText: The containment protocols failed years ago.

cards.name: Retaliate
cards.description: Gain 5 Block. Whenever you're attacked this turn, deal 4 damage back.
cards.flavorText: Every blow returned twofold.

cards.name: Self-Destruct Sequence
cards.description: Deal 20 damage. Take 8 damage. Gain 4 Overheat.
cards.flavorText: Warning: This action cannot be undone.

cards.name: Pain Threshold
cards.description: Take 1 less damage from all sources.
cards.flavorText: The nerves stopped screaming. Now they barely whisper.

cards.name: Thermal Lance
cards.description: Deal 15 damage. If Overheat is 5+, this costs 1 less.
cards.flavorText: Focused heat cuts through anything.

cards.name: Unbreakable
cards.description: Gain 16 Block. Gain 2 Armor.
cards.flavorText: They called the old Titans immortal. They were almost right.

cards.name: Hemorrhage
cards.description: Deal 5 damage. Apply 3 Bleed. Take 2 damage.
cards.flavorText: His blood runs hot. Theirs runs out.

cards.name: Meltdown
cards.description: Deal damage equal to your Overheat x3. Reset Overheat to 0. Take 5 damage.
cards.flavorText: The warnings blared. Korvax ignored them.

cards.name: Berserk
cards.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. Take 2 damage at the end of each turn.
cards.flavorText: The safeties disengaged. There's no going back.

cards.name: Immovable Object
cards.description: Whenever you gain Block, gain 2 additional Block. Gain 2 Armor.
cards.flavorText: Mountains move before he does.

cards.name: Chain Reaction
cards.description: Deal 8 damage. If this kills an enemy, gain 3 Energy and 2 Overheat.
cards.flavorText: One spark ignites the next.

cards.name: Avatar of War
cards.description: Whenever you play an Attack, gain 1 Rage. Rage now also increases damage dealt.
cards.flavorText: He was built for one purpose. Now he fulfills it.

cards.name: Fortify
cards.description: Block is not removed at the start of your next turn. Gain 10 Block.
cards.flavorText: The Titans could hold a position for decades. So can he.

cards.name: Meltdown Protocol
cards.description: At 10+ Overheat, deal 10 damage to ALL enemies at the end of your turn. Then lose 5 Overheat.
cards.flavorText: Controlled catastrophe. His specialty.

cards.name: Last Stand
cards.description: If HP is below 25%, gain 3 Energy and 3 Rage. Exhaust.
cards.flavorText: Cornered machines are the most dangerous.

cards.name: Titan's Core
cards.description: Overheat no longer damages you. At the end of each turn, if Overheat is 10+, deal 15 damage to ALL enemies.
cards.flavorText: Salvaged from the heart of a fallen god-machine. It still burns with ancient fury.

cards.name: Korvax Prime Protocol
cards.description: Whenever you take damage, deal that much damage to a random enemy. Gain 2 Rage at the start of each turn.
cards.flavorText: Dr. Veyla's final giftâ€”or final curse. The original combat protocol, unshackled.

cards.name: Invincible Fortress
cards.description: Gain 5 Armor. Block no longer expires. At the start of each turn, gain Block equal to your Armor x3.
cards.unlockCondition: Win a run taking less than 100 total damage
cards.flavorText: They built the Titans to be immortal. Korvax finally understands how.

overheat.description: Building reactor heat. At 10+, suffer increasing penalties. Reset with Vent or Meltdown cards.

thresholds.effect: Take 5 damage per turn, cards cost +1

rage.description: Accumulated fury. Increases damage dealt. Some cards consume Rage for powerful effects.

armor.description: Permanent damage reduction. Each point of Armor reduces incoming damage by 1.
